i2c_slave.c File Reference

The file implements the I2C Slave Driver for the XWR14xx/XWR16xx/XWR18xx/XWR68xx. The file implements the driver to conform to the MCPI standards. More...

I2CSlave_FxnTable gI2CSlaveFxnTable
 I2C Slave Driver Function Table. More...
 

Detailed Description

The file implements the I2C Slave Driver for the XWR14xx/XWR16xx/XWR18xx/XWR68xx. The file implements the driver to conform to the MCPI standards.
